title: SPACIOUS STUDIO WITH LAUNDRY IN UNIT, PRIVATE PATIO & DISHWASHER
posting_body: ['TEXT 847-220-2948 FOR FASTEST RESPONSE!', 'PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 190981778', 'Rent: $1,025 / Month', 'Beds: 0', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Only', 'Rent Includes:: Hot Water, Water', 'Spacious garden-level studio, 1 bath in Edgewater available now.', 'Wonderful location just off Broadway near shops and restaurants, and just 0.2 mile to the Bryn Mawr Red Line.', 'Apartment features include:', '- Updated kitchen with dishwasher and microwave', '- Laundry in unit', '- Private patio', '- Central air conditioning', '- Lots of lighting throughout', '- Updated bathroom', '- Cats welcome', 'FEATURES', 'Central Air', 'Dishwasher', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Microwave', 'Patio', 'Porch', '--', 'Bentley Phillips', 'Leasing', '847.220.2948', 'Square One Team, brokered by Jason Dalka', '2851 North Lincoln, Chicago, IL 60657']
